alert.note: Alert for Butler; Conecuh; Covington; Crenshaw; Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 17 at 4:10AM CDT until October 18 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT LATE TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON FOR LOCATIONS ALONG AND SOUTHEAST OF THE I-65 CORRIDOR DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS AROUND 15 MPH, AND HIGH ERC AND KBDI VALUES... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR CONECUH, BUTLER, CRENSHAW, ESCAMBIA, AND COVINGTON COUNTIES IN ALABAMA... The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 056, 057, 058, 059 and 060. * WINDS...North 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
